arm_group.arm_group_label: implantation of a trifocal IOL (AT LISA tri 839MP)

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to evaluate the far, intermediate and near visual acuities with
      a trifocal IOL.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Visual Acuity and Patient Satisfaction With AT LISA TRI 839MP Intraocular Lenses

detailed_description.textblock:
After bilateral cataract surgery, monocular and binocular uncorrected (UCVA) and best
      distance corrected visual acuity (BCVA) will be measured at far (4m), intermediate (80 cm)
      and near (40 cm) distance as well as the subjective refraction.

      A patient questionnaire will be used to assess the patient satisfaction and spectacle
      independence.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Man or woman, over 50 years of age

          -  Bilateral implantation of a trifocal intraocular lens

          -  Capsular bag implantation

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Existing ocular pathology

          -  Surgical complications

          -  Corneal astigmatism ≥ 1.0D

intervention.arm_group_label: implantation of a trifocal IOL (AT LISA tri 839MP)

authority: France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)
United Kingdom: National Institute for Health Research

primary_outcome.description: Monocular and binocular uncorrected and best distance corrected
